018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021
022import org.apiguardian.api.API;
023import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
024import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber;
025
026/**
027 *  The definition of the SVG element {@code <use>}. <br>
028 *  <br>A {@code <use>} element is useless without the attribute {@code href}
029 *  set; therefore it is required already on creation and will not appear in
030 *  this interface.
031 *
032 *  @see SVGUtils#createUse(java.net.URI)
033 *  @see SVGUtils#createUse(SVGElementWithChildren,java.net.URI)
034 *
035 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
036 *  @version $Id: SVGUse.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
037 *  @since 0.0.5
038 *
039 *  @see "https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/single-page.html#struct-SVGElement"
040 *
041 *  @UMLGraph.link
042 */
043@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVGUse.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
044@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
045public sealed interface SVGUse extends SVGElement, AllowsConditionalProcessingAttributes, AllowsGraphicalEventAttributes, AllowsPresentationAttributes, AllowsXLinkAttributes permits SVGElementAdapter, org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.internal.SVGUseImpl
046{
047        /*-----------*\
048    ====** Constants **========================================================
049        \*-----------*/
050    /**
051     *  An empty array of {@code SVGUse} objects.
052     */
053    public static final SVGUse [] EMPTY_SVGUse_ARRAY = new SVGUse [0];
054
055        /*---------*\
056    ====** Methods **==========================================================
057        \*---------*/
058    /**
059     *  Sets the height of the cloned element.
060     *
061     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
062     *      attribute will be removed.
063     */
064    public void setHeight( final SVGNumber value );
065
066    /**
067     *  Sets the width of the cloned element.
068     *
069     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
070     *      attribute will be removed.
071     */
072    public void setWidth( final SVGNumber value );
073
074    /**
075     *  Sets the x coordinate for the top left corner of the cloned element.
076     *
077     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
078     *      attribute will be removed.
079     */
080    public void setX( final SVGNumber value );
081
082    /**
083     *  Sets the y coordinate for the top left corner of the cloned element.
084     *
085     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
086     *      attribute will be removed.
087     */
088    public void setY( final SVGNumber value );
089}
090//  interface SVGUse
091
092/*
093 *  End of File
094 */
